--- title: "Rother Valley 10K" date: "2010-05-15" author: "Adrian Joseph" image: https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2010-05-15_ROTHER_VALLEY_10K/img/01.png categories: [race report, run] format: html lightbox: match: auto effect: fade desc-position: right loop: false --- ![](https://storage.googleapis.com/blogs_josa/sport/2010-05-15_ROTHER_VALLEY_10K/img/01.png) Rother Valley is a pretty park with a lake in the middle in Rotheram, UK. This race was a loop around the lake. This was my second ever 10K race, and I remember it was harder than the first one (it was also about 4min faster). My housemate and I took the bus from Sheffield and headed down to Rother Valley for the race. All in all, a good race venue and a good race. ::: {.cell} ::: {.cell-output-display} ```{=html}
